definition: executive/senior management/(contraction of 高級管理|高级管理)
to own a controlling number of shares in a company
vice-chairman (of an organization)/vice president (of a company)/deputy governor (of a bank)
(law) legal representative of a corporation (e.g. chairman of the board of a company, principal of a school etc)
